text: Kaufering is a municipality in Landsberg in Bavaria in Germany. It is on the river Lech. During World War II, a subcamp of Dachau concentration camp was placed there. ==Notable people== * Andreas Mäckler (born 1958), German editor ==References== ==Other websites== * The European Holocaust Memorial - Citizens´ Association "Landsberg in the 20th Century" (English) * Citizens´ Association "Landsberg in the 20th Century" - Founded 9 November 1983 - Since over 30 year active within the remembrance of the local Holocaust Concentration Camp Kaufering/Landsberg * European Holocaust Memorial - a monument ensemble against racism and totalitarianism at the place of the crime - under the executive management of European Holocaust Memorial Foundation Category:Landsberg (district)
title: Kaufering, Bavaria
